title: Comeback Handaxe
content:
Comeback Handaxe Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This loyal axe always returns to its owner after being thrown. However, it has no eyes and therefore dreadful aim, inevitably returning to its thrower blade-end-first. Handaxe Light Thrown 0.9 1

Comeback Handaxe

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
